name: The Portuguese Platform for Defence Industries
goal:
Our Mission:

The Strategic Concept of National Defence identifies as a vector and as a priority strategic line of action the consolidation of the external relations of Defence, through actions that potentiate opportunities in the Defence Economy domain, taking in account the advantages that can be obtained for external activities of national economy that aim the pursuit of this goal, whether it is in a ministerial level or in other dimensions regarding Defence structures, including the Armed Forces.

Considering this concept, it has been given to idD – The Portuguese Platform for Defence Industries, the responsibility of the implementation of a national strategy destined to the external promotion of the Defence Technological and Industrial Base – DTIB, in order to, develop the national capacities in this field, claiming Portugal as a producer and exporter of technology and services within the Defence Economy.

With this action, it is intended to contribute for conditions that increase Portuguese exportations which operate in the Defence Economy market, as well as, to contribute with this external action, for the maintenance and creation of highly qualified workplaces in Portugal.

idD’s action, is focused on initiatives that generate added value to the National Defence Economy, internationally competitive, subjected to the international competition, with growth potential and sustainable in long terms, with an impact that endures long enough so it generates added value effects, directly or indirectly, to the national economy.


Our Goals:

- Identify business opportunities for national companies including the BTID in strategic markets;

- Streamline, prepare and support visits and missions abroad, related to the defense of Economics;

- Internally publicize the opportunities identified abroad, paving the way for increased exports of Portuguese industry;

- Supporting the definition and the development of national companies’ internationalization strategies, including the BTID;

- Acting network through exchanges between large and small companies, stimulating joint projects considering to do so, military attachés and the Portuguese diaspora, thus seeking to maximize existing resources.

- Promote contacts and partnerships with organizations, agencies and other entities of public interest, national and international.
interests: Business and Industry, Digital economy and society, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Research and innovation, Single market
